google_translated: What was the word disappeared in the wind?

en_text: The truth is, I'd realized it long ago.
jp_text: 本当はもう　とっくに気付いていたんだ
google_translated: I really noticed it again

en_text: ♪ Be My Friend! Yeah, you played dumb! ♪
jp_text: 知らない振りしたって
google_translated: I missed it

en_text: ♪ Be My Side! But I saw right through you! ♪ be my side
jp_text: 全部気付いてたよ
google_translated: I noticed all

en_text: What? No.
jp_text: 嫌だよ
google_translated: I hate it
